Comment: You can read Medicaid data for yourself. It is there (or used to be, not sure if Trump removed it yet) in the SSA data archives. The thing is, the more peoples' healthcare it taken care of, the harder they work. The more health problems a person has, the less they work. This simple concept is the reason why universal healthcare is thriving in almost every single developed nation EXCEPT the USA. We, and we alone, are facing multiple health crises post-covid, almost exclusively due to relying on privatized insurance.  Every single dollar that goes into medicaid, AND foodstamps, is some of the best-spent tax dollars you can possibly have. And there would be MORE tax dollars available, if Medicaid and foodstamps were EXPANDED and better funded.
